snippet.title: How Amber Heard FOOLED Everyone Into Believing Her LIES!!!
snippet.description:
How Amber Heard FOOLED Everyone Into Believing Her LIES!!!

Subscribe to The Spotlight 👉  https://bit.ly/3txAgy1

WATCH NEXT: ▶️

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6vH_1E0jJN8

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZJawm0jcmY8&t=2s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q32tzepkrj4&t=10s

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

RELATED VIDEOS:👇

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O1Rrb3ET21c

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aBgHjlrv-0E&t=1s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j_XOf43VV8w&t=1s

As per Amber Heard's Ex-Manager and Kevin Murphy’s statement, it is crystal clear that It was Amber Heard and Not Johnny Depp who was the physical abuser in the relationship. Moreover, Johnny Depp was considered as the ‘Wife beater’ by Sun’s oEditor. However, early in the trial Depp and his team painted Amber Heard as the abuser in their relationship and shared accounts of her alleged aggressive behaviour.

While Depp's lawyer alienated her, she was never violent toward him when law played a recording of her admitting to hitting and throwing pots and pans at Depp. She said she only did it to get away from him. As per daily mail Heard also implied that/ Los Angeles police lied when they stated, “she wasn't injured and there was no property damage during an alleged accident she and her friends reported in May 2016”. 

Fans homed in on heard's testimony saying she backpedalled on several of her statements on Twitter, also, there is a thread with a transcript of her testimony and some people are scanning it for lies thrown on her was a fair nose and see what they see what the jury and judge think to tell the world.

Back in the year 2015 Johnny Depp and Amber Heard were on a trip from Honolulu USA to Brisbane Australia. The trip was supposed to end well and needed the couple to spend some quality time together. Well, that did not happen, rather things got worse for them. The trip turned out to be too ugly and controversial to the public. After getting back from Honolulu to Australia, Amber Heard accused Depp of several charges including the Domestic Violence Case. While she publically fooled people stating Depp brutally beat her causing swelling of her lips and severe bruises on her body Amber Heard Found Guilty

Kevin Murphy is someone who worked for almost 8 years for Amber Heard.The 2015 case got Murphy into trouble as Amber accused Murphy of not letting her understand the important law of Australia. Whereas Kevin already knew about issues that would arise if the dogs were taken without proper documentation. 

Katie James is an ex-manager of Amber Heard, and now a loyal supporter of Johnny Depp. She managed to bring out the truth ahead of and provide Justice to Johnny Depp. She stated that back in 2015 Amber said to her that she was sexually abused and was raped at machete-point in Brazil about 25 years ago. Misusing the statement Amber Heard turned the entire story relating it to Depp, Katie said. Katie and Murphy both claimed that it was Amber who was the abuser in a relationship and not Depp. 

Johnny Depp and Amber Heard Defamation Case
Defamation is the common term for a claim involving injury to one's reputation caused by a false statement by another person. The troubled marriage of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp seems never-ending... 

Whereas, the Defamation allegation put up by Amber Heard against Johnny Depp is still ongoing. Well, let us know about the same in detail...In recent times it surely seems as though we can't go a week, or so without getting another piece of news or information about the ongoing war that's happening between Amber Heard and Johnny Depp. 

The Couple has been forcing all sorts of accusations at one another, Moreover the cases that have followed have been filled with shocks, twists and testimonies.To inform you, Amber Heard already received a Major victory in the UK where she accused Johnny Depp with charges.
She stated that Johnny Depp has beaten her, so just because he lost the libel case doesn't mean the main case against Amber Heard is so easily dismissed. Besides if it was that easy why didn't she do that the moment that the appeal was lost exactly number four new evidence, here's another thing in the libel case. There were certain pieces of evidence that either hadn't appeared yet or were found too late to make it relevant in the , that won't be a problem here with this defamation suit because the case hasn't started yet as it's been delayed to 2022 clevver news amber heard as mera in aquaman amber heard aclu yellowflash 2 stevie j raw

#AmberHeard #JohnnyDepp #JusticeForJohnnyDepp #JusticeForDepp #TheSpotlight #MeToo
